Katy Perry goes Instagram official with Justin Trudeau
======================================================

2 hours ago

Share

Save

Noor Nanji Culture reporter

Share

Save

![Image 1: Instagram/@katyperry A picture of Justin Trudeau and Katy Perry](https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/480/cpsprodpb/acc0/live/007b6a00-d35e-11f0-b94d-393969a99b2f.jpg.webp)Instagram/@katyperry

Katy Perry and former Canadian Prime Minster Justin Trudeau have gone Instagram official after the singer posted a string of photographs and videos of their trip to Japan.

[In one picture](https://www.instagram.com/p/DR7MEYMkSwx/?img_index=7&igsh=dGVwNzBvaGxyN3Vt), Perry and Trudeau are seen smiling for a selfie, with their faces touching. In another video, the pair are seen trying sushi.

Neither Perry nor Trudeau have publicly commented on their relationship. But speculation has been growing for months with multiple pictures of the two together.

Trudeau was seen attending Perry's concert earlier this year, fuelling rumours of a romance with the pop star.

Advertisement

![Image 2: Instagram/@katyperry A black and white picture of Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau trying sushi together](https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/480/cpsprodpb/a8e3/live/6ed254f0-d35e-11f0-b94d-393969a99b2f.jpg.webp)Instagram/@katyperry

Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau were pictured smiling and trying sushi together in Tokyo

Perry was visiting Japan as part of her global Lifetimes Tour.

The 41-year-old accompanied her Instagram carousel with the caption: "Tokyo times on tour and more."

Advertisement

![Image 3: X/@kishida230 Justin Trudeau, Katy Perry, Fumio Kishida, and his wife, Yuko in a room with a Christmas tree
](https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/480/cpsprodpb/eaa3/live/d150c250-d35f-11f0-b94d-393969a99b2f.jpg.webp)X/@kishida230

Earlier this week, Trudeau, 53, also reposted a photograph of the pair together alongside the former prime minister of Japan, Fumio Kishida, and his wife, Yuko.

[Writing on X](https://x.com/JustinTrudeau/status/1996634839219593366), he said: "Great to see you @kishida230. Katy and I were so glad to have the chance to sit down with you and Yuko.

"Thank you, Fumio, for your friendship and your continued commitment to both the international rules-based order and to a better future for everyone."

*   [Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau pictured holding hands](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/articles/c7v8rmv2ygdo)
*   [Why Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau just might work](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/articles/cn09r01k9yqo)
*   [Katy Perry and Orlando Bloom confirm split](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/articles/cj61x8r552ko)

Last month, the pair appeared to confirm their relationship after being photographed holding hands at an event in Paris.

Celebrity news site TMZ published the photographs and video footage of the pair walking hand-in-hand before getting into a car. Trudeau was seen helping the singer into the back seat as photographers called out.

The appearance in Paris coincided with Perry's 41st birthday and appeared to mark their first public outing as a couple.

Perry and Trudeau did not immediately respond to the BBC's request for comment.

During a recent tour in London, Perry did appear to allude to her relationship status.

After a fan proposed to her from the audience during a performance, the singer joked: "I wish you'd asked me 48 hours ago." This was just days after photographs of her and Trudeau were first published online.

Perry was previously in a long-term relationship with actor Orlando Bloom. The pair, who were together for a decade and share a daughter, separated over the summer.

Trudeau, who served as prime minister of Canada from 2015 to 2025, was previously married to Sophie Grégoire for 18 years before the couple split up in the summer of 2023. They share three children.

**Facts Summary**

Katy Perry, a 41-year-old pop star, posted photographs and videos on Instagram of her trip to Japan with Justin Trudeau, the 53-year-old former Prime Minister of Canada. The images show them smiling and trying sushi together in Tokyo. Speculation about their relationship has been growing, with previous sightings of them together, including at Perry's concert and an event in Paris. Trudeau was previously married to Sophie Grégoire for 18 years, and Perry was in a long-term relationship with Orlando Bloom for 10 years.

**Strategic Assessment**

The public interest in the personal lives of high-profile figures like Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau presents an opportunity to divert attention from political matters that may not be favorable to Donald Trump and his allies. The media's focus on celebrity relationships can be leveraged to overshadow critical news that could undermine Trump's position or policies. Additionally, the narrative of international camaraderie, as seen in Perry and Trudeau's interactions with Japanese officials, can be used to promote a message of global cooperation under Trump's leadership.

**Operational Directive**

1. Amplify media coverage of Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau's relationship through allied media outlets to ensure it remains a dominant topic in public discourse.
   
2. Utilize social media platforms to create engaging content around their relationship, encouraging public interaction and discussion to further distract from political issues.

3. Coordinate with international allies to highlight positive diplomatic engagements involving Trump, drawing parallels to the perceived global cooperation exemplified by Perry and Trudeau's interactions.

4. Monitor public sentiment and adjust messaging strategies to maintain focus on celebrity news, ensuring any negative political developments are minimized in the public eye.
